entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You've infiltrated the hideout and placed the Surveillance Devices
entries.journal_entry_description: Infiltrate the Sulfur Lake Pirate hideout and find good locations to place the Surveillance Devices. There are only specific locations around the cave that will work to conceal the device.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Find the Sulfur Lake Pirate Hideout
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Find good locations to place the surveillance devices.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Report to Rel Thelcar that the device placement is complete.
